AboutUs.title: Renovo&atelier
AboutUs.description:
We are a workshop where every thing gets a second chance and a new breath. 
It is important for us not just to hem or replace the zipper, but to make sure that the clothes are again pleasing, fit comfortably and look decent. 
We care about details and truly love our work - from repairs to custom tailoring and embroidery. 
For us, the value of a thing is measured by the stories that it will continue with you.

FAQAnswers.title1: What are the turnaround times for repairs and tailoring?
FAQAnswers.answer1: The time depends on complexity: basic repairs (hemming, zipper replacement, minor restoration) usually take 1–3 days, more complex alterations or custom tailoring — from 5 to 14 days. We always agree deadlines in advance and strive to deliver earlier, never compromising on quality.
FAQAnswers.title2: Do you work with expensive and delicate materials?
FAQAnswers.answer2: Yes, we confidently work with leather, cashmere, silk, and items with decorative elements. For complex fabrics, we use gentle technologies and an individual approach to preserve the fabric structure and appearance.
FAQAnswers.title3: Can you tailor an item exactly to fit my body?
FAQAnswers.answer3: Absolutely, custom fitting is one of our strengths. We clarify your preferences, take precise measurements, and offer solutions that will be comfortable to wear and look neat according to the item’s cut.
FAQAnswers.title: Answers to questions

feedback1.name: Daria A.
feedback1.text: The repair was done perfectly — the seams are straight, just like on a new item. The craftsmen are truly attentive to details and do not cut corners on quality. I picked up my coat ahead of schedule and now wear it with pleasure.

feedback2.name: Anna B.
feedback2.text: “The best atelier where I've ever had my clothes fixed.” The embroidery and zipper replacement were done neatly; you can’t even tell there was a repair — the result exceeded expectations. I recommend it if you're after reliability and a personal approach.

feedback3.name: Maria F.
feedback3.text: “The remake of my old dress is pure delight, as if it was sewn anew.” The team really listens and gives honest suggestions about what would look better and last longer. The fit became perfect, now it's my favorite thing to wear.

feedback4.name: Alex M.
feedback4.text: “I entrusted them with a leather jacket with scuffs and a tricky tear — the result is like fine jewelry work.” You can feel their professionalism and love for the craft. The jacket looks even better than before, the job was fast and with real care.

PrivacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPolicy.intro: Welcome to the Renovo Atelier website. We respect your privacy and strive to transparently explain what data we collect, how we use it and how we protect it.

section1.title: 1. What data we collect
section1.item1: Personal data that you provide yourself (name, email, phone number, data specified in the contact form).
section1.item2: Technical data (IP address, device type, browser, operating system, site pages, visit time) — automatically through cookies and analytics services.
section1.item3: Files that you upload when submitting requests, if such functionality is available (for example, clothing images for repair assessment).

section2.title: 2. How we use your data
section2.item2: estimating the cost and timeframes of repair or tailoring services;
section2.item3: improving the quality of the website and service;
section2.item4: analytics, marketing and content personalization (only with your consent, if required by your region).

section3.title: 3. Legal basis for processing
section3.description: We process personal data based on:
section3.item2: the necessity of contract execution or pre-contractual actions (responses to your requests);
section3.item3: legitimate business interests (analytics, service optimization, website security);

section4.title: 4. Cookies and analytics
section4.description1: We use cookies to optimize the website. With their help, we can analyze traffic and make the site more convenient. No user identification occurs without consent if required by the laws of your country.
section4.description2: You can manage cookies in your browser settings or through the consent banner on the website.

section5.title: 5. Who we may share data with
section5.description: We do not sell your personal data to third parties. We may only transfer it to:
section5.item1: partners who help us provide services or ensure the website operates (for example, hosting, email newsletters, analytics), subject to strict security compliance;
section5.item2: government authorities — only upon lawful request;
section5.item3: payment processing services (if payment is available on the site) — to perform financial transactions.

section6.title: 6. International data transfer
section6.description: If data is transferred outside the EU, it only occurs to countries or services that provide an adequate level of data protection, or using approved transfer mechanisms provided by international standards.

section7.title: 7. How we protect data
section7.description: We implement technical and organizational security measures:
section7.item4: protection against unauthorized access and leaks.

section8.title: 8. How long we store data
section8.item1: as long as necessary to provide the service and maintain communication;
section8.item2: or until you request data deletion, if there is no legal obligation to retain it.

section9.title: 9. Your rights
section9.item1: request a copy of your data;
section9.item4: request data deletion ('right to be forgotten');
section9.item6: file a complaint with the data protection supervisory authority.

section10.title: 10. Contacts
section10.description: If you have questions about privacy or data processing, please contact us using the contact form on the website or the official contact email.
